title: Primeval survivors
creator_credit: Hugh Macdonald, New Zealand National Film Unit and Greg Stitt
brief_description: The Tuatura is the sole survivor of a reptile species that is now confined to a few off-shore islands in New Zealand. The film is set on tiny Stevens Island, a wildlife sanctuary which is home for 100,000 of these unique reptiles.
creator_credit_for_label: Hugh Macdonald, New Zealand National Film Unit and Greg Stitt
